key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including FDA scrutiny and patent infringement lawsuits
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global reliance and potential disruptions
Competitive pressures from major players in the medical technology sector
Declining stock performance and investor confidence concerns
controversies: Patent infringement lawsuit filed by Distribution Intelligence Systems, LLC
Product liability lawsuit (Cordle v. Enovis Corporation)
social_issues: Commitment to ethical business practices and a Global Human Rights Policy
governance_issues: Ongoing legal disputes and regulatory scrutiny impacting governance
